Description: This field is used to record an identifier attributed to the documented entity.
This field is used to record the type of the identifier attributed to the documented entity.
This field is used to record the institution, group or individual responsible for providing the documented entity's identifier.
This field is used to record the source based on which the identifier was attributed to the documented entity.
This field is used to record the formal type of the documented object.
This field is used to record the main name attributed to the documented entity.
This field is used to record the language of the main name attributed to the documented entity.
This field is used to record a specific part of the name attributed to the documented entity.
This field is used to record the type of the specific part of the name attributed to the documented entity.
This field is used to record an alternative  name under which the documented entity is known.
This field is used to record the type of the alternative name that has been attributed to the documented entity.
This field is used to record the language of the alternative name attributed to the documented entity.
This field is used to record the earliest known date for use of the alternative name attributed to the documented object.
This field is used to record the latest known date for use of the alternative name attributed to the documented entity.
This field is used to record the organization or individual attributing the alternative name to the documented object.
This field is used to record the source on the basis of which the organization attributing the alternative name use based their attribution.
